query.amazon_review_classification:
Instruct: Classify the given Amazon review into its appropriate rating category.
Query: {text}
query.amazon_counterfactual_classification:
Instruct: Classify a given Amazon customer review text as either counterfactual or not counterfactual.
Query: {text}
query.massive_intent_classification:
Instruct: Given a user utterance as query, find the user intents.
Query: {text}
query.massive_scenario_classification:
Instruct: Given a user utterance as query, find the user scenarios.
Query: {text}
query.livedoor_news:
Instruct: Classify Livedoor news articles into topics based on their titles and contents.
Query: {text}
query.mewsc16:
Instruct: Classify Wikipedia news articles into topics based on their titles.
Query: {text}
query.jsts:
Instruct: Retrieve semantically similar text.
Query: {text}
query.jsick:
Instruct: Retrieve semantically similar text.
Query: {text}
query.paws_x_ja:
Instruct: Determine if the given two sentences are paraphrases of each other.
Query: {text}
